      • nullCheck

        public void nullCheck​(java.lang.String method,
                      java.lang.Object... o)
        Throws a NullPointerException if any values in the varargs parameter, o are null. The method performs no actions if all values in o are non-null.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the calling method.
        o - varargs parameter containing all objects to verify.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any element of parameter o is null.

      • nullCheck

        public void nullCheck​(java.lang.String method,
                      java.util.Date date,
                      java.lang.Object... o)
        Throws a NullPointerException if any values in the varargs parameter o or if the date parameter is null. The method performs no actions if all values in o or if date are non-null.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the calling method.
        o - varargs parameter containing all objects to verify.
        date - the Date object to verify.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any element of parameter o or date are null.
